summary: 商家授权代表签署合作协议，承诺遵守协议并承担权利义务，授权期限有限，可提前30天取消，授权书中英文版本冲突以中文版为准。
question: 平台对商家授权代表人签署合作协议的期限和撤销有何规定？
text: 签约授权书Letter of Signature Authorization致： 优选海购（澳门）有限公司To Global Premium Buy  (Macau) Limited我司【商家注册登记证书上的名称】授权【姓名：，职位：】代表我司与贵司及贵司的关联公司签署任何的合作协议及文件。我司承诺，我司将遵守[授权代表姓名]代表我司与贵司或贵司关联公司签署的合作协议及文件，并承担协议及文件下全部的权利义务。We, [insert the company name of the Merchant ], hereby authorize [insert the name of the authorized signatory], who is [please describe the title or position of the person], to sign and execute any and all cooperation agreements and documents with Global Premium Buy  (Macau) Limited and its affiliate companies (hereinafter, "you") on behalf of us. We hereby represent and warrant that, we will strictly abide by the agreements and documents signed and executed by [insert the name of the authorized signatory] with you and bear all rights and obligations thereof.授权期限为【       年       月      日】至【          年      月      日】The authorization is effective from [insert the effective date] to [insert the expiring date].我司保留经提前30天向您书面通知，取消、撤销或终止授权的权利。We reserve the right to cancel, revoke or terminate the authorization upon a 30-day prior written notice to you.本授权书以中文和英文书就，中英文版本如有冲突，应以中文版为准。This letter of authorization is written in Chinese and English. In case of any inconsistency between Chinese version and English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.授权人：【商家注册登记证书上的名称】[Please insert the company name of the Merchant]【印章或签名】Seal or Signature职位：【需为董事或授权签字人】Position [need to be the director or an authorized signatory]日期Date填写要求：声明书需要开店主体公司CEO或董事签字，并机打签字人姓名及职务，需加盖境外主体公章或境外授权签字人手写签名签约授权书(1).docx11.74KB
